meanings.sent1: The town had a lovely fetes to mark the end of summer.
meanings.sent2: The annual fetes in the park always drew a big crowd.
meanings.sent3: At the fetes, everyone danced and laughed together.
meanings.sent4: The fetes was a colorful tapestry of joy and music.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the air at the festive fetes.

meanings.definition: To honor or entertain with a party or celebration
meanings.sent1: She fetes her friends by throwing them surprise parties.
meanings.sent2: The company fetes its employees with a grand dinner every year.
meanings.sent3: He decided to fetes his promotion with a weekend getaway.
meanings.sent4: The town fetes its heroes with a parade and speeches.
meanings.sent5: The community fetes its volunteers with a heartfelt thank-you ceremony.

meanings.definition: A lavish social event or party
meanings.sent1: The charity ball was a glamorous fetes attended by many.
meanings.sent2: The royal family hosted a grand fetes at the palace.
meanings.sent3: The Hollywood fetes was filled with stars and paparazzi.
meanings.sent4: The exclusive fetes was the talk of the town for weeks.
meanings.sent5: The elegant fetes was a night to remember for all the guests.
